And these disciples would hear the Lord Jesus Christ say, all power is given unto me in heaven and in earth. Go ye therefore and teach all nations. And he gives that Great Commission. And so he kind of, the book ends, if you will, of the Great Commission. On the front end of it is the fact that he says, all power is given unto me. On the back of the commission, he says, I am with you all way, even unto the end of the world. Now think about that. We have this responsibility, this commission to go, but the Lord in his declaration and giving this commission, he says, I have all power and I'll be with you. Isn't that precious? Why is Jesus all the world to you? I hope that you would say, as the songwriter said, Jesus is all the world to me. And I have three more reasons that I'll give you next week as to why he is all the world to me, but when we start this and evaluate the scriptures, I would say number one, because of who he is, and number two, because of his mighty power. Let's pray. Father, we love you. We thank you for loving us.
